an1.316-332:4.1: “Ekapuggalo, bhikkhave, loke uppajjamāno uppajjati bahujanaahitāya bahujanaasukhāya, bahuno janassa anatthāya ahitāya dukkhāya devamanussānaṃ.
an1.316-332:4.4: So bahujanaṃ saddhammā vuṭṭhāpetvā asaddhamme patiṭṭhāpeti.
an1.316-332:4.5: Ayaṃ kho, bhikkhave, ekapuggalo loke uppajjamāno uppajjati bahujanaahitāya bahujanaasukhāya, bahuno janassa anatthāya ahitāya dukkhāya devamanussānan”ti.
an1.316-332:6.1: “Ekapuggalo, bhikkhave, loke uppajjamāno uppajjati bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya, bahuno janassa atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṃ.
an1.316-332:6.4: So bahujanaṃ asaddhammā vuṭṭhāpetvā saddhamme patiṭṭhāpeti.
an1.316-332:6.5: Ayaṃ kho, bhikkhave, ekapuggalo loke uppajjamāno uppajjati bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya, bahuno janassa atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānan”ti.
an1.316-332:8.1: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ mahāsāvajjaṃ yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, micchādiṭṭhi.
an1.316-332:8.2: Micchādiṭṭhiparamāni, bhikkhave, mahāsāvajjānī”ti.
an1.316-332:10.1: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekapuggalampi samanupassāmi yo evaṃ bahujanaahitāya paṭipanno bahujanaasukhāya, bahuno janassa anatthāya ahitāya dukkhāya devamanussānaṃ yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, makkhali moghapuriso.
an1.316-332:10.2: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, nadīmukhe khippaṃ uḍḍeyya bahūnaṃ macchānaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya anayāya byasanāya;
an1.316-332:10.3: evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, makkhali moghapuriso manussakhippaṃ maññe loke uppanno bahūnaṃ sattānaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya anayāya byasanāyā”ti.
an1.316-332:12.1: “Durakkhāte, bhikkhave, dhammavinaye yo ca samādapeti yañca samādapeti yo ca samādapito tathattāya paṭipajjati sabbe te bahuṃ apuññaṃ pasavanti.
an1.316-332:14.1: “Svākkhāte, bhikkhave, dhammavinaye yo ca samādapeti yañca samādapeti yo ca samādapito tathattāya paṭipajjati sabbe te bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavanti.
an1.316-332:16.1: “Durakkhāte, bhikkhave, dhammavinaye dāyakena mattā jānitabbā, no paṭiggāhakena.
an1.316-332:18.1: “Svākkhāte, bhikkhave, dhammavinaye paṭiggāhakena mattā jānitabbā, no dāyakena.
an1.316-332:20.1: “Durakkhāte, bhikkhave, dhammavinaye yo āraddhavīriyo so dukkhaṃ viharati.
an1.316-332:22.1: “Svākkhāte, bhikkhave, dhammavinaye yo kusīto so dukkhaṃ viharati.
an1.316-332:24.1: “Durakkhāte, bhikkhave, dhammavinaye yo kusīto so sukhaṃ viharati.
an1.316-332:26.1: “Svākkhāte, bhikkhave, dhammavinaye yo āraddhavīriyo so sukhaṃ viharati.
an1.316-332:28.1: * “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, appamattakopi gūtho duggandho hoti;
an1.316-332:28.2: evamevaṃ kho ahaṃ, bhikkhave, appamattakampi bhavaṃ na vaṇṇemi, antamaso accharāsaṅghātamattampi”.
an1.316-332:30.1: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, appamattakampi muttaṃ duggandhaṃ hoti … appamattakopi kheḷo duggandho hoti … appamattakopi pubbo duggandho hoti … appamattakampi lohitaṃ duggandhaṃ hoti;
an1.316-332:30.2: evamevaṃ kho ahaṃ, bhikkhave, appamattakampi bhavaṃ na vaṇṇemi, antamaso accharāsaṅghātamattampi”.
